DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal project determine innovative behavioral weight loss program incorporate new development field behavior therapy produce superior weight control standard behavioral treatment . A sample 200 adult community participate study .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptance-based Behavioral Treatment Obesity : Maintenance Mechanisms
DOC.criteria: Be age 18 70 Have BMI 2750 Have ability engage physical activity ( i.e. , walk least 2 block without stop rest ) . Agree provide permission research team regularly contact physician throughout study share information change weight . Successfully complete step enrollment process You medical condition psychiatric condition may limit ability comply behavioral recommendation program pose risk weight loss . You pregnant plan become pregnant next three year . Report recently begin course change dosage prescription medication cause significant weight loss weight gain . You participate plan participate another weight loss program next three year . The research team identify factor would render potentially unable unlikely follow protocol , unable benefit .
